issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

this was seen on 4.0.2, not on seen on 3.1.2

1.Base UI>views>scroll views>scrollable view
2.tap add and swipe through to the end

results: a white view with no text will briefly appear the be replaced by the expected view. I crashed a few times (not repro) while doing this. If you don't see the issue by adding a single view, add whole bunch before swiping through the views.

{html}
fields.summary: scrollable view - "ghost views" appear after adding a few views
